title: aoluain
author: aoluain
created_time: December 18, 2022, 12:21:05 PMLast edit: December 25, 2022, 01:21:47 AM by aoluain
content: Quote from: aoluain on August 27, 2022, 12:39:48 PMI HAVE 64 PRINTS, THESE WERE THE FIRST PRINTS OF THE BITCOIN COLOURING BOOK OFF THE PRESS WHICH WERE ERROR'SThe machine was set to print back to back! The operator reset the machine and started again.The item is stamped, dated and signed &&Free Christmas raffle for the community! This is Error print 3 of 6.There will be 100 slots available, 1 spot per person. 00 to 99I hope to have the draw on Christmas Eve, If all spots are not taken by then I will spread out the remaining slots to the first number of claimers!CLAIM YOUR NUMBER NOW!Sales of the actual book are on THIS threadI have added to the raffle a random copy of the Bitcoin Colouring Book and some stickers to accompany.
